name: Basement RPG
description:
Just going to back these up on itch.io in case the old LD site goes offline. It probably won't, but better to make sure.

Anyways, this is my first LD entry, which I submitted for Ludum Dare 32, the one with the Unconventional weapon theme. It's... far from good, but hey, everyone starts somewhere, right?

You may notice a lack of music... and sound fx... that's because I removed it all, since I thought that all audio had to be made from scratch. I didn't... know if built in audio is okay, but I didn't want to take any chances.

If you do play this, be sure to equip new weapons when you get them. Forgetting to do so will result in lots and lots of death.
